name: The Extraordinary Contemporary Chateau
description:
DESCRIPTION
A haven of freedom dedicated to your special event.
Located just 60 km from Paris and 30 minutes from Roissy Charles de Gaulle airport, the Domaine offers 103 hectares of greenery and forest in the heart of a region rich in historical and cultural heritage. The venue can also arrange shuttles to and from the airport to make your stay go even more smoothly!
Nestled in the centre of the estate, a combination of a charming castle from 19th century with an adjacent contemporary reception space, which is flooded with golden light from the floor to ceiling windows, offers a flexible and unique space for your wedding breakfast or cocktail leading out on to the terrace.
With a reception room that can accommodate up to 450 people and 12 bedrooms on site as well as a magnificent terrace overlooking the forest of Retz, the Domaine is an exceptional backdrop for your wedding day.
Perfect photo opportunities, or location for your ceremony, include a 20-hectare park, its fairways, water features and the ruins of a 13th century chapel.
There is a 450-space car park and helipad
A "LITTLE CASTLE" OF 19 TH CENTURY
A charming building entirely renovated which combines historical imprint and modernity, it includes welcoming living spaces, a square overlooking the park and the forest, a large south-facing terrace and 8 very comfortable bedrooms.
A CONTEMPORARY EXTENSION
A 460m² reception room bathed in light as well as an additional modular space of 290m², with direct access to the magnificent terrace of the castle. Its possibility of creating two distinct and autonomous spaces for a multitude of uses.
Includes:
460 m² space with a magnificent glass roof plunging into the heart of the estate.
Reception up to 450 people with direct access to a terrace that can accommodate 250 people in cocktail format.
The 20 hectare park completes this set to accommodate all leisure activities.
ACCOMMODATION
12 fully renovated rooms, one with disabled access and a family suite.
10 double bedrooms
1 family room (sleeps 6)
1 family suite (sleeps 4)
Breakfast served in the lounges of the castle.
Our nearby Hotel and Gîte with a total capacity of 30 rooms welcomes you 10 minutes from the site.
All rooms connected to free wifi with particular attention paid to the quality of sound in rooms and video-projection devices
Provision of additional spaces: pre-equipped kitchen - cold room - storage area - laundry - with independent access for service vehicles.
Optional: provision of the furniture necessary for your event (tables, chairs, desk, etc.).
A selection of service providers is at your disposal to meet all your catering, entertainment and decoration needs.
Pricing:
From October to April : 9300 € from Saturday 09:00 to Sunday 16:00 (or 09:00 the D-Day to 16:00 the day after).
Additional hour from Sunday 12:00 : 300€ per hour
From May to September : 11100 € from Saturday 09:00 to Sunday 16:00 (or 09:00 the D-Day to 16:00 the day after).
Additional hour from Sunday 12:00: 400€ per hour
-Rooms on site : 12 rooms /30 beds : 1405€ (or 1705€ including breakfasts)
If you would like some more information then please do get in touch and we will be more than happy to help.
additional_info:
